results.p: May 19, 2024 — Magnesium helps keep blood pressure normal, bones strong, and the heart rhythm steady. It also controls your blood sugar levels and makes protein and DNA.

results.p: Magnesium is an essential macronutrient that plays a key role in many body processes, including muscle, nerve, and bone health, and mood.
